name: Superior Group of Companies, Inc.
description: Superior Group of Companies, Inc. is a leading provider of branded and customized products, including apparel, promotional products, and business solutions. Founded in 1920, the company has a long history of innovation and quality in the textile industry. With a diverse portfolio that includes specialized divisions such as Superior Uniform Group, which focuses on uniform and workwear solutions, and SGC Promotional Products, which specializes in branded merchandise, Superior Group delivers tailored solutions to meet the needs of various industries. The company emphasizes sustainability, utilizing eco-friendly materials and practices in its production processes. Superior Group is dedicated to enhancing customer experiences through advanced technology, including online design tools and efficient supply chain management. With a commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction, Superior Group aims to be the partner of choice for organizations looking to promote their brands and enhance their corporate identity.

seo.meta_title: Superior Group of Companies, Inc. | Branded Apparel and Promotional Products
seo.meta_description: Explore Superior Group of Companies, Inc., a leader in branded apparel and promotional products, committed to quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction.

faq.question: What does Superior Group of Companies do?
faq.answer: Superior Group provides branded and customized products, including apparel and promotional merchandise.

faq.question: Where is Superior Group headquartered?
faq.answer: Superior Group is headquartered in Bayshore, New York, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Superior Group offer?
faq.answer: Superior Group offers uniforms, corporate apparel, and various branded promotional items.
